item.title: How To Watch the 2025 MLS Playoffs
item.dc:creator: Taylor Kujawa
item.description: It’s survival of the fittest as MLS clubs fight for a place in the MLS Cup Final. Our guide helps you watch the 2025 MLS Playoffs with schedule, streaming links, and highlights.
item.content:encoded: It’s survival of the fittest as MLS clubs fight for a place in the MLS Cup Final. Our guide helps you watch the 2025 MLS Playoffs with schedule, streaming links, and highlights.

item.title: How To Watch BYU Cougars Football in 2025
item.dc:creator: Alex Vejar
item.description: How far can the BYU Cougars football team go without Jake Retzlaff at QB? Our detailed guide will help Cougar Nation watch every Cougars game in 2025.
item.content:encoded: How far can the BYU Cougars football team go without Jake Retzlaff at QB? Our detailed guide will help Cougar Nation watch every Cougars game in 2025.

item.title: NFL Plus Review 2025: Score Live NFL Action on the Go
item.dc:creator: Taylor Kujawa
item.description: NFL+ is your new destination for watching full NFL game replays—replacing NFL Game Pass in the U.S. While the streaming service now includes live game coverage, don’t expect to ditch your TV provider.
item.content:encoded: NFL+ is your new destination for watching full NFL game replays—replacing NFL Game Pass in the U.S. While the streaming service now includes live game coverage, don’t expect to ditch your TV provider.

item.title: From Premier League to MLS: How To Watch Soccer on TV in the US
item.dc:creator: Taylor Kujawa
item.description: If you are a soccer fan, don’t miss our lineup of the best TV providers you need to catch all the matches from your team. Score some inside information here!
item.content:encoded: If you are a soccer fan, don’t miss our lineup of the best TV providers you need to catch all the matches from your team. Score some inside information here!

item.title: Late-Night TV Show Lineups This Week: Colbert, Fallon, Meyers, and More (Oct. 27–Nov. 2)
item.dc:creator: Randy Harward
item.description: Can’t go to sleep until you’ve had your late-night laughs? We feel you. Here’s this week’s couch lineups for The Late Show with Stephen Colbert, Jimmy Kimmel Live!, The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon and more.
item.content:encoded: Can’t go to sleep until you’ve had your late-night laughs? We feel you. Here’s this week’s couch lineups for The Late Show with Stephen Colbert, Jimmy Kimmel Live!, The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon and more.
